const tealSource = `#pragma version 5
txn ApplicationID
int 0
==

txn OnCompletion
int CloseOut
==

txn OnCompletion
int DeleteApplication
==
bnz main_l8
txn OnCompletion
int UpdateApplication
==

err

txn Sender
byte "owner"
app_global_get
==
return

==
